tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data (
    year INT,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    yield_per_acre DECIMAL,
    average_rainfall DECIMAL,
    soil_ph_level DECIMAL
);
CREATE TABLE crops (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(50), yield INT);
CREATE TABLE fields (field_id INT PRIMARY KEY, field_name VARCHAR(50), crop_id INT, yield_year INT, yield_amount INT, FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops (crop_id));

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation (rotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, field_id INT, previous_crop_id INT, current_crop_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields (field_id), FOREIGN KEY (previous_crop_id) REFERENCES crops (crop_id), FOREIGN KEY (current_crop_id) REFERENCES crops (crop_id));

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation (
    rotation_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    previous_crop_id INT,
    next_crop_id INT,
    rotation_season VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (rotation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_recommendation (
    recommendation_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    soil_id INT,
    recommended_crop_name VARCHAR(100),
    recommended_season VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (recommendation_id)
);
